rows.label: tlk41300022_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, hey.
Thinking of joining the vigilantes, are
you? Kidding, kidding!

rows.label: tlk41300022_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard Iira's behind this latest
trouble again. They really need to
give it a rest.

rows.label: tlk41300022_04_msg0002
rows.name:
They attacked us once before, right?
Everyone's shaken enough as it is.
Damn nuisance, that's what they are.

rows.label: tlk41300022_04_msg0003
rows.name:
We've been rounding up vigilantes to
watch the streets, but even still, we
couldn't measure up to Iira.

rows.label: tlk41300022_04_msg0004
rows.name:
At the moment, we're investing all our
effort in the refugee crisis. I feel
exhausted just thinking about it...
